message.body: Thanks for that detailed Dr Tan email. Some parts of it I'm not sure I understand, but mostly I've got it. My favorite Jason Winner quote (so far): I don't know why everyone gets such a hard on about Dr Tan. It's not like he made this stuff up himself.
Hahaha. The problem is that most acu schools don't teach channel acupuncture but what i'll call the herbalist zangfu form of acupuncture.
As for new patients I was referring to patients u consider primary treatments for your patient log.
Yep I have 3 primary and 1 assist so far. I'm nervous about getting my ten people 4 times...

That's a great start. Eventually u can always team up w classmates to make sure u treat ea other 4x fill in the gaps if u have any...but then again that will be difficult to trade if u aren't willing to let others treat u.
That's a great start. Eventually u can always team up w classmates to make sure u treat ea other 4x fill in the gaps if u have any...but then again that
will be difficult to trade if u aren't willing to let others treat u.
Did you have to do that to get your 10?

Not sure I *had* to but I know I did treat a bunch of classmates 4x and vice versa and they were included in my ten. It's not like we waited until June to do it in panic - we just treated another over the course of the year and got our 4 in in case we ne

That makes sense. Sorry if it was worded weird I just wory about scheduling people since there are weird gaps I between terms and Saturdays are full for an entire month so its hard to tell someone to return weekly when there are no slots.
Wait until your patients get double booked and u have to deal with the won lack of organization
There are only 4 of us on Saturdays so only 2 slots. It kind of sucks.
Oh I can't wait for that!
How much do you know about luo channels and points? They seem really neat!!!! (So dorky.)

They are neat. Different theories as to how and when to use them. St40 doesn't resolve phlegm randomly - it's the luo of the spleens 5e pair!!! Deadman says group w sp3 and has list of diff luo source pairings
